p: In The DISTRICT COURT of the SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON TERRITORY, Holding Terms at Montesano, in, and for the County of Chehalis.
The TERRITORY of WASHINGTON, PLAINTIFF. vs. Leander Brown DEFENDANT. ) INDICTMENT.

We Leander Brown as Principal, and Charles H Byles and T.H. Shamley as Sureties, acknowledge ourselves to owe and be indebted to the Territory of Washington, in the just and full sum of Four Hundred Dollars,
